AcceptAttachment.description: Grants permission to accept creation of an attachment between a source and destination in a core network

AssociateConnectPeer.description: Grants permission to associate a Connect Peer

AssociateCustomerGateway.description: Grants permission to associate a customer gateway to a device

AssociateLink.description: Grants permission to associate a link to a device

AssociateTransitGatewayConnectPeer.description: Grants permission to associate a transit gateway connect peer to a device

CreateConnectAttachment.description: Grants permission to create a Connect attachment

CreateConnectPeer.description: Grants permission to create a Connect Peer connection

CreateConnection.description: Grants permission to create a new connection

CreateCoreNetwork.description: Grants permission to create a new core network

CreateDevice.description: Grants permission to create a new device

CreateGlobalNetwork.description: Grants permission to create a new global network

CreateLink.description: Grants permission to create a new link

CreateSite.description: Grants permission to create a new site

CreateSiteToSiteVpnAttachment.description: Grants permission to create a site-to-site VPN attachment

CreateTransitGatewayPeering.description: Grants permission to create a Transit Gateway peering

CreateTransitGatewayRouteTableAttachment.description: Grants permission to create a TGW RTB attachment

CreateVpcAttachment.description: Grants permission to create a VPC attachment

DeleteAttachment.description: Grants permission to delete an attachment

DeleteConnectPeer.description: Grants permission to delete a Connect Peer

DeleteConnection.description: Grants permission to delete a connection

DeleteCoreNetwork.description: Grants permission to delete a core network

DeleteCoreNetworkPolicyVersion.description: Grants permission to delete the core network policy version

DeleteDevice.description: Grants permission to delete a device

DeleteGlobalNetwork.description: Grants permission to delete a global network

DeleteLink.description: Grants permission to delete a link

DeletePeering.description: Grants permission to delete a peering

DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource

DeleteSite.description: Grants permission to delete a site

DeregisterTransitGateway.description: Grants permission to deregister a transit gateway from a global network

DescribeGlobalNetworks.description: Grants permission to describe global networks

DisassociateConnectPeer.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Connect Peer

DisassociateCustomerGateway.description: Grants permission to disassociate a customer gateway from a device

DisassociateLink.description: Grants permission to disassociate a link from a device

DisassociateTransitGatewayConnectPeer.description: Grants permission to disassociate a transit gateway connect peer from a device

ExecuteCoreNetworkChangeSet.description: Grants permission to apply changes to the core network

GetConnectAttachment.description: Grants permission to retrieve a Connect attachment

GetConnectPeer.description: Grants permission to retrieve a Connect Peer

GetConnectPeerAssociations.description: Grants permission to describe Connect Peer associations

GetCoreNetwork.description: Grants permission to retrieve a core network

GetCoreNetworkChangeEvents.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of core network change events

GetCoreNetworkChangeSet.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of core network change sets

GetCoreNetworkPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve core network policy

GetCustomerGatewayAssociations.description: Grants permission to describe customer gateway associations

GetLinkAssociations.description: Grants permission to describe link associations

GetNetworkResourceCounts.description: Grants permission to return the number of resources for a global network grouped by type

GetNetworkResourceRelationships.description: Grants permission to retrieve related resources for a resource within the global network

GetNetworkResources.description: Grants permission to retrieve a global network resource

GetNetworkRoutes.description: Grants permission to retrieve routes for a route table within the global network

GetNetworkTelemetry.description: Grants permission to retrieve network telemetry objects for the global network

GetResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a resource policy

GetRouteAnalysis.description: Grants permission to retrieve a route analysis configuration and result

GetSiteToSiteVpnAttachment.description: Grants permission to retrieve a site-to-site VPN attachment

GetSites.description: Grants permission to describe global networks

GetTransitGatewayConnectPeerAssociations.description: Grants permission to describe transit gateway connect peer associations

GetTransitGatewayPeering.description: Grants permission to retrieve a Transit Gateway peering

GetTransitGatewayRegistrations.description: Grants permission to describe transit gateway registrations

GetTransitGatewayRouteTableAttachment.description: Grants permission to retrieve a TGW RTB attachment

GetVpcAttachment.description: Grants permission to retrieve a VPC attachment

ListConnectPeers.description: Grants permission to describe Connect Peers

ListCoreNetworkPolicyVersions.description: Grants permission to list core network policy versions

ListCoreNetworks.description: Grants permission to list core networks

ListOrganizationServiceAccessStatus.description: Grants permission to list organization service access status

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a Network Manager resource

PutCoreNetworkPolicy.description: Grants permission to create a core network policy

PutResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update a resource policy

RegisterTransitGateway.description: Grants permission to register a transit gateway to a global network

RejectAttachment.description: Grants permission to reject attachment request

RestoreCoreNetworkPolicyVersion.description: Grants permission to restore the core network policy to a previous version

StartOrganizationServiceAccessUpdate.description: Grants permission to start organization service access update

StartRouteAnalysis.description: Grants permission to start a route analysis and stores analysis configuration

TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a Network Manager resource

UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a Network Manager resource

UpdateConnection.description: Grants permission to update a connection

UpdateCoreNetwork.description: Grants permission to update a core network

UpdateDevice.description: Grants permission to update a device

UpdateGlobalNetwork.description: Grants permission to update a global network

UpdateLink.description: Grants permission to update a link

UpdateNetworkResourceMetadata.description: Grants permission to add or update metadata key/value pairs on network resource

UpdateSite.description: Grants permission to update a site

UpdateVpcAttachment.description: Grants permission to update a VPC attachment

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

networkmanager:cgwArn.description: Filters access by which customer gateways can be associated or disassociated

networkmanager:subnetArns.description: Filters access by which VPC subnets can be added or removed from a VPC attachment

networkmanager:tgwArn.description: Filters access by which transit gateways can be registered, deregistered, or peered

networkmanager:tgwConnectPeerArn.description: Filters access by which transit gateway connect peers can be associated or disassociated

networkmanager:tgwRtbArn.description: Filters access by which Transit Gateway Route Table can be used to create an attachment

networkmanager:vpcArn.description: Filters access by which VPC can be used to a create/update attachment

networkmanager:vpnConnectionArn.description: Filters access by which Site-to-Site VPN can be used to a create/update attachment
